column1: #Text=I do n't know when gay revolution or gay rights ...
#Text=I do n't know how it happened or when it happened , but it was a parallel movement that happened at the same time I was alive .
#Text=DS : Is your ancestry Sicilian or Northern ?
#Text=My father was born there , in fact .
#Text=He was the only person from his family that came to the United States and he did so in 1920 .
#Text=DS : Do you ever pay any attention to Italian politics and the happenings with the Lega Nord ?
#Text=I pay attention to it when it 's in the headlines .
#Text=But do I pay attention to the point of caring ?
#Text=I do n't know that the Italians much care about politics .
#Text=I think it 's a country of family influences .
#Text=They 've had a mistrust of government ever since the fall of Rome .
#Text=Even now , with transportation and communications pervasive .
#Text=It used to be they were stuck in the hills and they did n't have any means of getting from one part of the mountain to the other so they were insular .
#Text=Now , it 's different , but it 's still not a country that 's a unified country .
#Text=I mean Italy is called a nation , but ... .
#Text=DS : They ca n't seem to do anything politically .
#Text=But on the other hand they live damn well .
#Text=There 's a kind of underground economy that 's been there , probably for centuries .
#Text=The statistics tells you this , this , this .

#Text=But underneath , there 's a core management this kind of internal management of mercenary affairs , or family connections , or ways of gaining what is known on the surface , but underneath there 's a whole mysterious way of prosperity in Italy that is n't shown .
#Text=You find the news reports or the books that are out saying one thing .
#Text=I do n't exactly ever see it and I 've traveled a lot .
#Text=I have n't traveled very much in the last ten years in Europe .
#Text=On a higher power and how he 'd like to die
#Text=DS : Do you believe in a higher power ?
#Text=I believe a higher power can exist for inspiring people toward fulfilling a dream .
